wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Charles Alexander Ramsay  (12 October 1936 – 31 December 2017) was a British Army officer.

response: * Major General Charles Alexander Ramsay CB OBE (12 October 1936 – 31 December 2017) was educated at the Royal Military Academy Sandhurst and rose to become Director General of the Territorial Army and was a member of the Queen's Body Guard for Scotland.
*Major General Charles Alexander Ramsay, O.B.E., late The Royal Scots Dragoon Guards (Carabiniers and Greys).
* Lieutenant Colonel Charles Alexander Ramsay (449039), The Royal Scots Dragoon Guards (Carabiniers and Greys).
*Charles Alexander Ramsay, 81, British Army officer.Major-General Charles Alexander Ramsay 1936-2017
